content: HOWDY!! My name is Jessi Carlson and I am a junior Mechanical Engineering major from the Woodlands, TX, but most importantly I am THE loudest and THE proudest member of the Fightin’ Texas Aggie Class of 2022!! A-A-A WHOOP!! I LOVE dancing and my gorgeous dogs Duke and Red! I’m always down for camping, adventuring, hammocking, and spontaneous road trips with friends! I am super excited to meet the class of 2024!!
name: Jessi Carlson
